description: Returns information about a core network Connect peer associations.

parameters.name: GlobalNetworkId
parameters.description: The ID of the global network.

parameters.name: ConnectPeerIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the Connect peers. (string) ---

nested_items.name: ConnectPeerAssociations
nested_items.description: Displays a list of Connect peer associations.

nested_items.name: ConnectPeerId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Connect peer.

nested_items.name: GlobalNetworkId
nested_items.description: The ID of the global network.

nested_items.name: DeviceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the device to connect to.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the Connect peer association.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next page of results.
